text: And when he heard that it was Jesus the Natsorean,The Text has ‘Natsorean’, not ‘Nazarene (Natsarene)’. Natsorean is presumably a reference to Isaiah 11:1, the Branch—Jesus was the Branch-man. Natsarene just means that He came from Natsareth. he began to call out and say, “O Son of David,Bartimaeus addresses Jesus as the Messiah. Jesus, have mercy on me!”
